line.comment: * DESCRIPTION: Checks to see if homebase needs to be restocked and if it
* does move to homebase and unload the specified quantities.
* Always keep a few drones in reserve

line.text: 'Could not deploy freight drone. None in cargo hold.'
'Could not deploy freight drone. Docking bays full?'
